name: Consuming Trap
description: Lay claim to an enemy's soul, dealing 3480 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.  If an affected enemy dies, you fill an empty Soul Gem and heal for 3200. You also restore 2400 Magicka and 2400 Stamina. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health, Magicka, and Stamina.
effectLines: Also restore Health, Magicka, and Stamina if enemy dies while affected.
coefDescription: Lay claim to an enemy's soul, dealing $1 Magic Damage over 10 seconds.  If an affected enemy dies, you fill an empty Soul Gem and heal for $2. You also restore $3 Magicka and $4 Stamina. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health, Magicka, and Stamina.
rawDescription:
Lay claim to an enemy's soul, dealing <<1>> over <<2>>.

If an affected enemy dies, you fill an empty Soul Gem and heal for <<3>>. You also restore <<4>> Magicka and <<5>> Stamina. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health, Magicka, and Stamina.
